properties.areaDesc: Marengo, AL; Greene, AL; Hale, AL; Sumter, AL
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 14 at 8:50AM CST by NWS Birmingham AL
properties.description:
...The flood warning continues for the Tombigbee River At Bevill Lock
and Dam...
...The flood warning continues for the Tombigbee River At
Gainesville Lock and Dam...
...The flood warning continues for the Tombigbee River At Demopolis
Lock and Dam...

.Recent heavy rainfall and additional rainfall during the next 48
hours will continue to produce rises along the Tombigbee River...
and a Flood Warning remains in effect along the river.

The Flood Warning continues for
The Tombigbee River At Demopolis Lock and Dam.
* until further notice...or until the warning is cancelled.
* At  8:15 AM Tuesday the stage was 70.6 feet.
* Flood stage is 68 feet.
* Minor flooding is occurring and Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...The river will continue rising to near 74.7 feet by
Saturday morning then begin falling.
* Impact...At 73 feet...some cabins and trailers along the river
begin to flood, as well as some secondary roads.  Widespread
flooding of lowlands in he area will occur.
properties.instruction:
Do not drive cars through flooded areas.  Turn Around...Don't Drown.

Another statement will be issued by Wednesday morning...or sooner if
conditions warrant.
